mapper.select: SELECT a.rec_id, a.group_id AS 'groupId', a.order_id, a.user_id, a.goods_name, a.goods_id, a.goods_sn, a.goods_num, a.original_img, a.market_price, a.goods_price, a.cost_price, a.coupon_price, a.member_goods_price, a.discount, a.give_integral, a.spec_key, a.spec_key_name, a.bar_code, a.is_comment, a.action_type, a.action_id, a.is_send, a.delivery_id, a.add_time, a.service_times, a.remain_times, a.service_min, a.is_real, a.expiring_date, a.order_amount, a.single_reality_price, a.single_norm_price, a.is_after_sales, a.ratio, a.ratio_price AS "ratioPrice", b.advance_flag AS "advanceFlag", a.reality_add_time AS "realityAddTime", SUM(b.app_total_amount) as "totalAmount", SUM(b.order_balance) as "orderBalance", SUM(b.service_times) as "remaintimes", SUM(b.order_arrearage) as "orderArrearage", SUM(b.app_arrearage) AS appArrearage, IFNULL(c.return_num,0) as "returnNum" FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details b ON a.rec_id=b.goods_mapping_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(return_num),0) AS return_num,goods_mapping_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND return_status in (11,12,13,14,15,16,21,22,23,24,25) GROUP BY order_id,goods_mapping_id) c ON c.goods_mapping_id = a.rec_id WHERE a.del_flag = 0 and a.order_id= #{orderId} GROUP BY a.rec_id

SELECT a.rec_id, a.group_id AS 'groupId', a.order_id, a.user_id, a.goods_name, a.goods_id, a.goods_sn, a.goods_num, a.original_img, a.market_price, a.goods_price, a.cost_price, a.coupon_price, a.member_goods_price, a.discount, a.give_integral, a.spec_key, a.spec_key_name, a.bar_code, a.is_comment, a.action_type, a.action_id, a.is_send, a.delivery_id, a.add_time, a.service_times, a.remain_times, a.service_min, a.is_real, a.expiring_date, a.order_amount, a.single_reality_price, a.single_norm_price, a.is_after_sales, a.ratio, a.ratio_price AS "ratioPrice", b.advance_flag as "advanceFlag", a.reality_add_time as "realityAddTime", SUM(b.app_total_amount) as "totalAmount", SUM(b.order_balance) as "orderBalance", SUM(b.service_times) as "remaintimes", SUM(b.order_arrearage) as "orderArrearage", IFNULL(c.return_num,0) as "returnNum" FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details b ON a.rec_id=b.goods_mapping_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(return_num),0) AS return_num,goods_mapping_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods WHERE order_id = #{orderid} AND return_status in (11,12,13,14,15,21,22,23,24,25) GROUP BY order_id,goods_mapping_id) c ON c.goods_mapping_id = a.rec_id WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.order_id= #{orderid} AND a.group_id = #{recid} or a.rec_id = #{recid} GROUP BY a.rec_id

SELECT a.group_id AS groupId, a.rec_id AS recid, a.order_id AS orderid, a.user_id AS userid, a.goods_name AS goodsname, a.goods_id AS goodsid, IF(o.is_real = 3,(SELECT SUM(service_times) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping WHERE rec_id = a.group_id),a.service_times) AS 'servicetimes', a.service_min AS servicemin, u.user_id AS 'users.userid', u.mobile AS 'users.mobile', u.nickname AS 'users.name', IF(a.group_id != 0,(SELECT SUM(service_times) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE goods_mapping_id = a.group_id),b.service_times) AS 'remaintimes', IF(a.group_id != 0,(SELECT SUM(surplus_amount) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE goods_mapping_id = a.group_id),b.surplus_amount) AS 'surplusAmount', o.is_real AS isreal, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order b WHERE b.goods_mapping_id = a.rec_id AND appt_status != 3) AS 'useServiceTimes', IF(o.is_real = 2,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order b WHERE b.group_id = a.group_id AND appt_status != 3),0) AS 'cardUseServiceTimes', (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE order_id = #{orderid} AND advance_flag = 1 LIMIT 1) AS 'advanceFlag', IF(o.is_real = 3,(SELECT single_reality_price FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping WHERE rec_id = a.group_id),a.single_reality_price) AS singleRealityPrice, s.skill_id AS skillId, e.label_id AS labelId, IF((DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(a.reality_add_time, interval a.expiring_date MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d')) >= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d'),0,1) AS isExpiring, g.franchisee_id AS franchiseeId FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_orders o ON a.order_id = o.order_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT order_id,goods_mapping_id,SUM(service_times) AS service_times,SUM(surplus_amount) AS surplus_amount FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE order_id = #{orderid} GROUP BY order_id,goods_mapping_id ) b ON a.rec_id = b.goods_mapping_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT group_concat(skill_id) AS skill_id,goods_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_goods_skill GROUP BY goods_id) s ON s.goods_id = a.goods_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT group_concat(label_id) AS label_id,goods_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_goods_equipment GROUP BY goods_id) e ON e.goods_id = a.goods_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods g ON g.goods_id = a.goods_id WHERE a.del_flag = 0 and a.order_id = #{orderid} and a.is_real = 1 AND o.order_status = 4 ORDER BY a.rec_id
SELECT a.integral FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.rec_id = #{recId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping ( order_id, group_id, user_id, goods_id, goods_franchisee_id, goods_name, goods_sn, goods_num, original_img, spec_key, spec_key_name, cost_price, market_price, goods_price, ratio_price, order_amount, total_amount, order_arrearage, order_balance, single_reality_price, single_norm_price, service_times, add_time, reality_add_time, expiring_date, is_real, service_min )VALUES( #{orderid}, #{groupId}, #{userid}, #{goodsid}, (select franchisee_id from mtmydb.mtmy_goods where goods_id = #{goodsid}), #{goodsname}, #{goodssn}, #{goodsnum}, #{originalimg}, #{speckey}, #{speckeyname}, #{costprice}, #{marketprice}, #{goodsprice}, #{ratioPrice}, #{orderAmount}, #{totalAmount}, #{orderArrearage}, #{orderBalance}, #{singleRealityPrice}, #{singleNormPrice}, #{servicetimes}, SYSDATE(), #{realityAddTime}, #{expiringDate}, #{isreal}, #{servicemin} )

SELECT , p.bar_code AS goodBarCode, p.goods_no AS goodsNo FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_spec_goods_price p ON (p.goods_id = a.goods_id AND p.spec_key = a.spec_key ) WHERE a.del_flag = 0 and a.order_id=#{orderid} AND p.del_flag = 0

SELECT rec_id as recid, goods_name as goodsname, goods_id as goodsid, spec_key as speckey, spec_key_name as speckeyname, market_price as marketprice, goods_price as goodsprice, ratio, ratio_price as ratioPrice, cost_price as costprice, order_amount as orderAmount, goods_num as goodsnum, total_amount as totalAmount, order_balance as orderBalance, order_arrearage as orderArrearage, single_reality_price as singleRealityPrice, single_norm_price as singleNormPrice, service_times as servicetimes, coupon_price as couponPrice, discount as discount, advance_price as advancePrice, member_goods_price as membergoodsprice, group_id as groupId, is_real as isreal, (SELECT SUM(a.service_times) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details a WHERE a.goods_mapping_id = rec_id AND type = 0) AS payRemaintimes from mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping where order_id = #{orderid}

FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a WHERE a.del_flag =0 and a.order_id=#{orderid} and a.user_id=#{userid}

SELECT a.goods_id as "goodsid", a.goods_name as "goodsname", SUM(a.goods_num) as goodsnum, a.goods_price as "goodsprice" FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a WHERE a.order_id=#{orderId} GROUP BY a.goods_id,a.goods_name,a.goods_price
SELECT m.goods_id AS "goodsid", m.spec_key AS "speckey", m.goods_num AS "goodsnum" FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping m WHERE m.order_id = #{orderId};

SELECT ogm.coupon_price AS 'couponPrice', ogm.member_goods_price AS 'membergoodsprice', ogm.total_amount AS 'totalAmount', ogm.goods_price AS 'goodsPrice', ogm.ratio_price AS 'ratioPrice', ogm.single_norm_price AS 'singleNormPrice', ogm.rec_id AS 'recid', ogm.single_reality_price AS 'singleRealityPrice', ogm.advance_price AS 'advancePrice', g.goods_type AS 'goodsType', u.office_id AS 'officeId', ogm.reality_add_time AS 'realityAddTime', ogm.is_real AS 'isreal', CASE WHEN ogm.is_real = 2 THEN (select SUM(ogm2.service_times) from mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping ogm2 where ogm2.group_id = ogm.rec_id and ogm2.is_real=1) ELSE ogm.service_times END AS 'totalTimes' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping ogm LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods g ON g.goods_id = ogm.goods_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users u ON u.user_id = ogm.user_id WHERE ogm.rec_id = #{recId} AND ogm.del_flag = 0

SELECT ogm.goods_id AS 'goodsid', ogm.goods_name AS 'goodsname', ogm.single_reality_price AS 'singleRealityPrice' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details ogd LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order ao ON ao.id = ogd.appt_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping ogm ON ogm.rec_id = ao.goods_mapping_id WHERE ogd.goods_mapping_id = #{recId} AND ogd.advance_flag = '0' AND ogd.service_times = -1

SELECT a.rec_id as 'recid', a.order_id as 'orderid', a.group_id as 'groupId', a.goods_id as 'goodsid', a.goods_name as 'goodsname', a.is_real as 'isreal', a.spec_key_name as 'speckeyname', a.market_price as 'marketprice', a.goods_price as 'goodsprice', a.cost_price as 'costprice', a.goods_num as 'goodsnum', a.order_amount as 'orderAmount', a.total_amount as 'totalAmount', a.order_arrearage as 'orderArrearage', a.original_img as 'originalImg' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a
WHERE a.group_id = #{recid}

SELECT a.rec_id as 'recid', a.order_id as 'orderid', a.group_id as 'groupId', a.goods_id as 'goodsid', a.goods_name as 'goodsname', a.is_real as 'isreal', a.market_price as 'marketprice', a.goods_price as 'goodsprice', a.cost_price as 'costprice', (a.goods_num-IFNULL(SUM(d.return_num),0)) as 'goodsnum', a.order_amount as 'orderAmount', a.total_amount as 'totalAmount', a.order_arrearage as 'orderArrearage' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.mapping_id, SUM(c.return_num) AS return_num FROM mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods b LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_returned_goods_card c ON b.id = c.returned_id WHERE b.order_id = #{orderid} AND b.return_status NOT IN (-10,-20,26) GROUP BY c.mapping_id ) d ON a.rec_id = d.mapping_id WHERE a.group_id = #{recid} GROUP BY a.rec_id

SELECT ogm.coupon_price AS 'couponPrice', ogm.member_goods_price AS 'membergoodsprice', ogm.total_amount AS 'totalAmount', ogm.goods_price AS 'goodsPrice', ogm.single_norm_price AS 'singleNormPrice', ogm.rec_id AS 'recid', ogm.single_reality_price AS 'singleRealityPrice', ogm.advance_price AS 'advancePrice', g.goods_type AS 'goodsType', u.office_id AS 'officeId', ogm.reality_add_time AS 'realityAddTime' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping ogm LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods g ON g.goods_id = ogm.goods_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users u ON u.user_id = ogm.user_id WHERE ogm.order_id = #{orderId} AND ogm.del_flag = 0
SELECT a.goods_num FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a WHERE a.order_id =#{orderId} AND a.rec_id = #{goodsMappingId}

SELECT b.service_times AS servicetimes, SUM(b.app_total_amount) AS "totalAmount", SUM(b.service_times) AS "remaintimes" FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details b ON a.rec_id = b.goods_mapping_id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.rec_id = #{goodsMappingId}
SELECT a.rec_id AS 'recid', a.order_id AS 'orderid', a.goods_num AS 'goodsnum' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT a.rec_id, a.group_id AS 'groupId', a.order_id, a.user_id, a.goods_name, a.goods_id, a.goods_sn, a.goods_num, a.original_img, a.market_price, a.goods_price, a.cost_price, a.coupon_price, a.member_goods_price, a.discount, a.give_integral, a.spec_key, a.spec_key_name, a.bar_code, a.is_comment, a.action_type, a.action_id, a.is_send, a.delivery_id, a.add_time, a.service_times, a.remain_times, a.service_min, a.is_real, a.expiring_date, a.order_amount, a.single_reality_price, a.single_norm_price, a.is_after_sales, b.advance_flag as "advanceFlag", a.reality_add_time as "realityAddTime", SUM(b.total_amount) as "totalAmount", SUM(b.order_balance) as "orderBalance", SUM(b.service_times) as "remaintimes", SUM(b.order_arrearage) as "orderArrearage", SUM(b.app_arrearage) AS "appArrearage", SUM(b.app_total_amount) AS "appTotalAmount" FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details b ON a.rec_id=b.goods_mapping_id WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.order_id= #{orderId} AND a.group_id = 0 GROUP BY a.rec_id
